requirements.summary: Preserve the existing registration form layout and structure, ensuring all current form fields (full name, email, phone number, membership type, and dynamic custom fields) remain in their current visual arrangement and styling
acceptanceCriteria: Registration form maintains its current field order and layout
All existing form fields (standard and dynamic) continue to render correctly
Form styling and visual presentation remain unchanged
Form validation behavior remains consistent with current implementation

file_operations.description: Review and verify the current registration form structure maintains all existing fields (fullName, email, phoneNumber, membershipType) and dynamic custom fields in their current order. Ensure no modifications are made to field arrangement, component structure, styling classes, or validation logic. Confirm the form continues to render standard fields followed by dynamically loaded custom fields from getCurrentForm backend capability, preserving the existing visual hierarchy and Tailwind CSS classes.
